name: Release Drafter Advanced Categories
description: Release Drafter with custom categories and template.

files.template:
name-template: 'v$NEXT_MINOR_VERSION'
change-template: '- $TITLE (by @$AUTHOR) in #$NUMBER'
categories:
  - title: '‚ú® Features'
    labels: ['feature', 'enhancement']
  - title: 'üêõ Fixes'
    labels: ['bug', 'fix']
  - title: 'üß∞ Maintenance'
    labels: ['chore', 'deps']
version-resolver:
  major: ['major']
  minor: ['minor', 'feature']
  patch: ['patch', 'fix', 'bug']
template: |
  ## Changes
  $CHANGES

name: Release Drafter

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened, reopened, synchronize]

jobs:
  update_release_draft:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: release-drafter/release-drafter@v6
        with:
          config-name: release-drafter.yml
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
